review: Remote broke sooo easily! I love the Fire stick but the circle part and enter button part have come off of my remote countless times. This last time it broke off it was stepped on and not able to be reapplied. :( I don't feel like these pieces should be able to come off so easily since they're pretty essential. I have been using my phone to control it, but it means I have to control it for my kids every time they want to change what they watch instead of logging them in and letting them have at it for their reserved tv time.
